description:
CollapsibleList component provides a list with a collapsible section that can be expanded
or collapsed by clicking on the header. It's an extension of the List component with added
functionality for expandable content.
name: List

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With border
<List withBorder>
<ListItem label="Item 1" subtitle="Description for item 1" />
<ListItem label="Item 2" subtitle="Description for item 2" />
</List>

tags.name: example
example
tags.text: With negative margin

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With decorators
<List>
<ListItem
label="With icon"
decorator={<Thumbnail icon={<UserIcon />} shape="round" />}
/>
<ListItem
label="With right decorator"
rightDecorator={<Badge>New</Badge>}
/>
</List>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Basic usage
<CollapsibleList title="Settings">
<ListItem label="Profile" />
<ListItem label="Account" />
<ListItem label="Security" />
</CollapsibleList>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With icon and starting expanded
<CollapsibleList
icon={<SettingsIcon size={24} />}
title="Advanced Settings"
startExpanded
>
<ListItem label="Developer Options" />
<ListItem label="Experimental Features" />
</CollapsibleList>
